languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} whose {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is IV or higher, the Bounty Hunter additionally gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} убивает {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добычу{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}рангом{/g} IV или выше, он получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} дополнительно.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Hunter kills prey whose difficulty tier is IV or higher, the Hunter additionally gains +2 AP.
Whenever the Hunter kills prey whose difficulty tier is IV or higher, the Hunter additionally gains +2 AP.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}杀死{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}为IV或更高的{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}时，都会额外获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 每当猎人杀死{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}为IV或更高的猎物时，都会额外获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} mata a una {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g} con un {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} de IV o más, gana +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} adicionales.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} whose {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is IV or higher, the Bounty Hunter additionally gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} mata a una {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g} con un {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} de IV o más, gana +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} adicionales.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} tötet, deren {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} IV oder höher ist, erhält der Kopfgeldjäger zusätzlich +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} whose {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is IV or higher, the Bounty Hunter additionally gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} tötet, deren {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} IV oder höher ist, erhält der Kopfgeldjäger zusätzlich +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseur de primes{/g} tue une {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proie{/g} dont le {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de {/g}difficulté est supérieur ou égal à IV, il gagne également +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} whose {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is IV or higher, the Bounty Hunter additionally gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le Chasseur tue une proie dont le {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} est supérieur ou égal à IV, il gagne également +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g}IV以上の{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}を倒したとき、追加で{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を+2得る。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} whose {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is IV or higher, the Bounty Hunter additionally gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ハンターが{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g}IV以上の獲物を倒したとき、追加で{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を+2得る。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Ödül Avcısı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}zorluk derecesi{/g} IV veya daha yüksek olan bir {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}avı{/g} öldürdüğünde ilave +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} kazanır.
